posts.title: HR Manager
posts.content: We are thrilled to announce a brand new opening in our company.
posts.requierments: Has to have minimum 5 years of experience in HR management, excellent communication skills, and a proven track record in team leadership.

posts.title: Receptionist
posts.content: We are thrilled to announce a brand new opening in our company.
posts.requierments: Has to have minimum 5 years of experience in taking calls, excellent communication skills, accuracy, and a proven track record in keeping apppointmetns.
